mapper.insert: insert into Moram_Team_One_Board(title, content, userid) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{userid})
mapper.select: select * from Moram_Team_One_Board order by bno desc
mapper.update: update Moram_Team_One_Board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, regdate=sysdate where bno=#{bno}
update Moram_Team_One_Board set replycnt = (select count(*) from Moram_Team_One_comment where bno=#{bno}) where bno = #{bno}
update Moram_Team_One_Board set viewcnt = viewcnt+1 where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select a.bno, a.title, a.content, b.name, a.regdate, a.replycnt, a.viewcnt from moram_team_one_board a left outer join moram_member b on userid = id and id = #{userid}
